data.title: DIRT (2023) Action, Directed By Bryan G. Thompson
data.text:
DIRT

Own It February 27, 2024

Genre: Action, Thriller

Runtime: 95 Minutes

UPC: MAV-6049, 824355604924

Storyline

Derek "Dirt" Roberts is the top lieutenant for Big Boss, a criminal mastermind who rose through the ranks from a "corner boy" to become the city's most powerful organized criminal. When the two grow apart, Dirt hatches an elaborate plan to leave the organization. This plan is interrupted when he comes face to face with Clutch, a rogue detective on a mission to find and rescue his partner and clear his name.

Produced By

Bryan G. Thompson

Directed By

Bryan G. Thompson

Cast

Bryan G. Thompson, Tyrone Betters, Jamal Woolard, Sophia P. Knolton, Kathy Thomas-Aldrich, Diajesma Orozco

About the Crew

Bryan G. Thompson is as award-winning director and producer known known for El Sueno (2016), Rogue Cell (2019), Thanksgiving with the Carter's (2019), Valentine's Date (2021), Carters Family Reunion (2021) and Christmas with the Carters (2022). Thompson is also the founder and CEO of the Miami Web Series Festival, also known as Miami Web Fest.

Jamal Woolard is an actor known for Notorious (2009), Barbershop: The Next Cut (2016), All Eyez on Me (2017), Christmas on my Block (2021), and Dope Boy Magic (2023).

Tyrone Betters is an actor known for No Better Love (2022), A True Christmas (2022), Guns Down (2023), and Perc 30 (2023).
